title: Energy Transfer and Wave Properties

vocab.definition: The ability to do work or cause change
A disturbance that transfers energy through matter or space
The number of waves that pass a point in a given time
The height of a wave, related to its energy
The distance between two similar points on a wave

teachingNotes: Use wave demonstrations with ropes or springs. Connect wave properties to sound and light. Discuss how energy moves without matter moving.

sample.question: What is the ability to do work or cause change?

truefalse.question: Waves can transfer energy without transferring matter.

multiplechoice.question: Which wave property is related to energy?

fillintheblank.question: The number of waves passing a point per second is the ________.

shortanswer.question: How do sound waves travel through air?
expectedAny: air molecules vibrate back and forth
